page.title: 14SPORTS AND RECREATION
page.content: Sports and recreation in the area is limited because of lack of facilities. However the following sports are played:bowling,clay pigeon shooting, cricket,darts,eurchure,football,golf, pool and skittles. { Bowls}:This takes place on a bowling green situated at Stanhope park.The club has a membership of about 70 people both male and female.{Clay {pigeon shooting }:Takes place at a local gunsmiths called Stuart Pinn.{ {Cricket}:Played at Stanhope park where the local team plays in the North Devon Leage and friendly fixtures.{ {Football}:Holsworthy commonly known as the Magpies play at the North Road ground.The team plays in the South West league divison one.{ {Darts/Eurchure/Pool/Skittles}:All these games are played in the local public houses.
